abstract: Stores like Target and Home Depot are scrambling to adjust advertising and marketing strategies to play up the value aspects of what they sell.
snippet: Stores like Target and Home Depot are scrambling to adjust advertising and marketing strategies to play up the value aspects of what they sell.
lead_paragraph: IN real estate, the saying goes, the golden rule is location, location, location. For retailers in a recession as severe as this one, it is value, value, value.

headline.main: With Shoppers Pinching Pennies, Some Big Retailers Get the Message
headline.print_headline: With Shoppers Pinching Pennies, Some Big Retailers Get the Message
